work_items.title: Validate canonical decomposition bundles before ADO writes
work_items.description: Implement layered validation so invalid bundles are blocked before any write attempt.
acceptance_criteria: Given a malformed bundle, when validation runs, then schema errors are reported with exact offending fields.
Given a valid bundle, when validation runs, then it is eligible for write planning without policy violations.

work_items.title: As a team lead, I can run contract-driven validation, so that invalid work bundles are blocked before writes.
work_items.description: Provide a command that validates schema, policy, and metadata in deterministic order and emits actionable reports.
acceptance_criteria: Given duplicate local IDs, when validation runs, then the bundle fails with duplicate ID details.
Given unsupported canonical fields, when validation runs, then the report identifies each unknown field key.
